author: Phil Vickery
method: Heat oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Line a crepe pan with filo pastry and butter the pastry.  Add another sheet and so on to make a flan case. Mix the eggs, cream, milk, sugar and vanilla together and pour into the flan case. Bake in the oven for 5-8 minutes or until golden.
ingredients: 3 sheets ready-made filo pastry,  butter, melted ,  2 free-range eggs,  30ml/1¼fl oz cream ,  30ml/1¼fl oz milk,  85g/3oz sugar,  vanilla essence, few drops
